metadata.name: onchain_academy
metadata.description: Superteam Academy on-chain program — courses, XP, credentials, achievements

accounts.name: xp_mint
docs: Passed as a signer (new keypair) so create_account can assign ownership

accounts.name: backend_minter_role
docs: Auto-registered MinterRole for the backend signer (defaults to authority)

accounts.name: credential_asset
docs: New credential NFT asset keypair — must sign the transaction.

accounts.name: credential_asset
docs: Existing credential NFT asset — not a signer, validated against enrollment record.

errors.name: InvalidLessonCount
errors.msg: Lesson count must be at least 1

errors.name: CredentialAssetMismatch
errors.msg: Credential asset does not match enrollment record

errors.name: CredentialAlreadyIssued
errors.msg: Credential already issued for this enrollment

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidXpReward
errors.msg: XP reward must be greater than zero

types.name: AchievementReceipt
docs: Thin PDA for on-chain double-award prevention.

fields.name: metadata_uri
docs: Default metadata URI for minted NFTs

fields.name: collection
docs: Metaplex Core collection for this achievement

fields.name: xp_reward
docs: XP awarded alongside the NFT (0 = no XP)

fields.name: creator
docs: XP recipient for creator rewards (not an authority — all admin goes through Config)

fields.name: course
docs: The Course PDA this enrollment belongs to

fields.name: completed_at
docs: When course was completed (None if in progress)

fields.name: lesson_flags
docs: lesson_count is u8 (max 255), so all valid indices fit within this bitmap.

fields.name: credential_asset
docs: Credential NFT address for this track (set by issue_credential)

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for future use (4 bytes — differs from 8 on other accounts; cannot resize without migration)

fields.name: minter
docs: Wallet or program PDA authorized to mint XP

fields.name: total_xp_minted
docs: Lifetime XP minted through this role
